values: 铁路；铁道；铁路系统；轨道；铁路线；铁路公司；铁路部门；铁路交通；铁路系统

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 在铁路工作；乘火车旅行；筑铁路
由铁道运输；铺设铁路；以捏造不实之罪使入狱
由铁路运输；乘火车旅行（railroad的ing形式）

word_group.brief_definition: 缆索铁路；缆索道；缆车索道；登山铁道
铁路桥梁；铁路大桥；铁路桥
铁路系统；铁路体系；铁道系统
铁路工人；铁路职工；铁路工作者

bilingual.source: The Trans-Siberian Railway is the longest railway in the world.
bilingual.target: 西伯利亚大铁路是世界上最长的铁路。

bilingual.source: How long has his son owned the train and railway set?
bilingual.target: 他儿子拥有那套火车和铁路玩具多久了？

bilingual.source: Many cities in the world have their own special railway service.
bilingual.target: 世界上许多城市都有自己的特殊铁路服务。

bilingual.source: For example, he has owned a train and railway set since his fourth birthday.
bilingual.target: 例如，他从四岁生日起就拥有了一套火车和铁路玩具。

bilingual.source: Sometimes trains in Japan are so crowded that railway staff are employed to push passengers inside.
bilingual.target: 有时日本的火车非常拥挤，以至于需要铁路工作人员将乘客推入车厢。

bilingual.source: The qinghai-tibet railway is the highest railway in the world.
bilingual.target: 青藏铁路是世界上海拔最高的铁路。

bilingual.source: They plan to build a new railway.
bilingual.target: 他们计划修建一条新的铁路。
这条铁路贯穿了整个国家。
这条铁路横跨了整个国家。

bilingual.source: This railway connects the north and south.

list.abstract: Railway（[ˈreɪlweɪ]），英文单词，名词，译为铁路；铁道；铁路系统。短语搭配有railway station（火车站）。例句为“Build a new ten-kilometre railway line.（修建一条新的十公里的铁路线。）” Railway相关名词近义词有path、track。

yingyinNormal.en: After pupating in our nation's railway system, I've burst forth as the world's smartest butterfly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在咱们国家铁路网上化蛹后，我破茧而出，变成了全世界最聪明的蝴蝶。

yingyinNormal.en: Once the site of rusting railway yards, Darling Harbor is now home to the National Maritime Museum, and popular parks, bars and restaurants.
yingyinNormal.zh: 达令港这里曾经是个破烂的铁路调车场，现在却发展成为国家海事博物馆、极受欢迎公园，酒吧和食肆的集中地。

yingyinNormal.en: To keep everything running smoothly requires precision organization, compared to the bustle outside, the railway bureau control center is an oasis of calm.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只有进行精密的运营，春运才能顺畅进行，和车站外面的喧闹相比，铁路局控制中心就像一片平静的绿洲。

yingyinNormal.en: The bedroom is not a hospital anymore. Now it's a railway station.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在卧室不再是医院了。现在又变成了火车站。

yingyinNormal.en: Why? Because I didn't want to speak to you in a railway carriage with, Tom and everyone else listening.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么？ 因为我不想在火车车厢里跟你交谈，我不想让汤姆和大家听到。

yingyinNormal.en: But doesn't it need railway tracks to run on? Oh no. I've fitted Gertrude with car wheels, so she can go anywhere she likes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可是火车不是需要铁轨才能运行吗？噢，不需要，我给格特鲁德装上轮子就行啦，这样她就可以去任何地方啦。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 铁路；铁道；铁路系统；铁道部门；轨道
n. 门口；门道；出入口；通道；门框；门拱；方法；途径；网关

word_family.mean: n. 方法；方式；路；道路；街道；巷；地区；地点；方面；条件；状况；船台；滑道

examination_example.sentence: If unable to calm down passengers, the <highlight>railways</highlight> may have to face the collapse of operations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果不能让乘客冷静下来，铁路可能不得不面临运营的崩溃。

examination_example.sentence: This should form part of a wider package of measures to address the long-running problems on Britain's <highlight>railways</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这应该成为解决英国铁路长期问题的大量措施的其中一部分。

examination_example.sentence: When the government talks about infrastructure contributing to the economy the focus is usually on roads, <highlight>railways</highlight>, broadband and energy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当政府谈到基础设施对经济的贡献时，重点通常是公路、铁路、宽带和能源。

direction_info.description:

由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

examination_example.sentence_trans: 修建一条新的十公里的铁路线。

examination_example.sentence: Many American people have seen Amish families, with the men wearing broad-brimmed black hats and the women in long dresses, in <highlight>railway</highlight> or bus terminals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多美国人在铁路或公共汽车终点站见过阿米什家庭，男人戴着宽边黑帽，女人穿着长裙。

examination_example.sentence: What does Judy often do at the <highlight>railway</highlight> station?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 朱蒂经常在火车站做什么？

examination_example.sentence: Listen, I'm coming back this afternoon, and I'll take a bus from the <highlight>railway</highlight> station.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 听着，我今天下午回来，我将从火车站乘公共汽车回来。

examination_example.sentence: How will the woman get back from the <highlight>railway</highlight> station?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这位女士怎样从火车站回来？

examination_example.sentence: And now checking-in by swiping an ID card is available at high-speed <highlight>railway</highlight> stations in most cities across China.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，中国大多数城市的高铁站都支持刷身份证办理托运手续。

examination_example.sentence: Although the traffic was heavy, we got to the <highlight>railway</highlight> station on time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管路上很堵，我们还是准时到达了火车站。

examination_example.sentence: Every Chinese takes pride in our scientific technology, such as high-speed <highlight>railway</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个中国人都为我们的科技而自豪，比如高速铁路。
